item.title: Runecrafting
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

EDIT Okay so accutally im getting a compiling error message now help me fix please!

cannot find symbol:
Itemhandler.addItem(Item.randomRc, 100);
^
Itemhandler.addItem(Item.randomRc, 100);
^

So the source i downloaded didnt have rune crafting!
cough bastards cough
So that means i had to do my self! Hurray
Heres my codes would you mind looking over
and tell me whats wrong or give me suggestions
well nothingâ€™s wrong it works fine but you get the point
the only thing i didnt do is level requirments. Like if you where this level
you get this much exp or you can get this rune. Ill probbally add that later.

        public static int Rc[] = { 553, 554, 555, 556, 557, 558, 559, 560, 561, 562, 563, 564, 565, 566 };
        public static int randomRc() {
                return Rc[(int) (Math.random() * Rc.length)];
        }
if(UsedOnObjectID == 2478 && ItemID == 1436 && playerHasItem(1436, 28)){ //rune crafting
setAnimation(791);
stillgfx(186, absY, absX);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);

deleteItem(1436, 1);

deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
deleteItem(1436, 1);
addSkillXP(2000, 20);
Itemhandler.addItem(Item.randomRc, 100);
sM("You craft some runes!");
} else {
sM("You need a full inventory (28) of rune essence to craft!");
}

btw ik its kinda noob done but i still am a bit of a newbie coder.
